title: Tonkatsu ramen
content:
Tonkatsu ramen is a traditional pork soup from Japan. It takes three days to make, but it is worth every minute, because the complex taste of this ramen really take you to Japan.

Making instructions:

  1. Soak the bones, boil them until all trash and blood is cleared.
  2. Multiple steps of making broth
  3. Make tare
  4. Make aromatic oil
  5. Make ajitama
  6. Make chashuu
  7. Assemble ramen
